WelcomeModal.welcomeText1:
Onyx brings all your company's knowledge to your fingertips,
ready to be accessed instantly.
WelcomeModal.welcomeText2:
To get started, we need to set up an API key for the Language Model
(LLM) provider. This key allows Onyx to interact with the AI model,
enabling intelligent responses to your queries.

AdminSettingsPage.title: Workspace Settings
AdminSettingsPage.description: Token rate limits enable you control how many tokens can be spent in a given time period. With token rate limits, you can:
AdminSettingsPage.setGlobalRateLimit: Set a global rate limit to control your team's overall token spend.
AdminSettingsPage.setUserRateLimit: Set rate limits for users to ensure that no single user can spend too many tokens.
AdminSettingsPage.setUserGroupRateLimit: Set rate limits for user groups to control token spend for your teams.
AdminSettingsPage.enableAndDisableRateLimits: Enable and disable rate limits on the fly.
AdminSettingsPage.globalRateLimitDescription: Global rate limits apply to all users, user groups, and API keys. When the global rate limit is reached, no more tokens can be spent.

DocumentSetsPage.title: Document Sets
DocumentSetsPage.description: Document Sets allow you to group logically connected documents into a single bundle. These can then be used as a filter when performing searches to control the scope of information Onyx searches over.
DocumentSetsPage.name: Name
DocumentSetsPage.cannotUpdateWhileSyncing: Cannot update while syncing! Wait for the sync to finish, then try again.
DocumentSetsPage.failedToScheduleDeletion: Failed to schedule document set for deletion - {errorMsg}

categoryDescriptions.Storage: Integrate with cloud storage and file hosting services.
categoryDescriptions.Wiki: Link to wiki and knowledge base platforms.
categoryDescriptions.CustomerSupport: Connect to customer support and helpdesk systems.
categoryDescriptions.CustomerRelationshipManagement: Integrate with customer relationship management platforms.
categoryDescriptions.Messaging: Integrate with messaging and communication platforms.
categoryDescriptions.ProjectManagement: Link to project management and task tracking tools.
categoryDescriptions.CodeRepository: Integrate with code repositories and version control systems.
categoryDescriptions.Other: Connect to other miscellaneous knowledge sources.
